name: Mighty Little War Dragon - A Game Set in the Age of Magic
name_original: Mighty Little War Dragon - A Game Set in the Age of Magic
description:
Take command of the mighty war dragon in this simple, yet fun and addicting game.

Tap the screen to make the mighty dragon flap his wings, while dodging the deadly spikes!

Features
- High quality graphics
- Super fun
- Easy to pick up
- Challenging
- Highly addictive
- Endless game play
- Hours of bouncing excitement
- Game center

Search "Tardent" on the App Store for more great apps and games.
